00019 
00020 #ifndef __surfit_solver_cg__
00021 #define __surfit_solver_cg__
00022 
00023 #include <algorithm>
00024 #include <vector>
00025 
00026 #include <errno.h>
00027 
00028 #include "vec.h"
00029 #include "vec_alg.h"
00030 
00031 #include <float.h>
00032 
00033 using namespace std;
00034 
00035 namespace surfit {
00036 
00037 template <class M, class V>
00038 vec * cg(M * A, V * b, int max_it, REAL tol, vec *& X, REAL undef_value = FLT_MAX) {
00039 
00040         int flag = 0;                                // initialization
00041         int iter = 0;
00042         
00043         REAL bnrm2 = norm2( b );
00044         if  ( bnrm2 == REAL(0) )
00045                 bnrm2 = REAL(1); 
00046 
00047         vec * r = new vec(b->size());
00048         
00049         vec * x = NULL;
00050         if (!X) {
00051                 x = new vec(b->size());
00052                 int cnt;
00053                 for (cnt = 0; cnt < b->size(); cnt++) {
00054                         (*x)(cnt) = (*b)(cnt);
00055                 };
00056         }
00057         else 
00058         {
00059                 x = X;
00060                 X = NULL;
00061         }
00062 
00063         // r = b - A*x;
00064         A->mult(x,r);
00065         int r_cnt;
00066         REAL error_norm = bnrm2;        
00067         REAL error = 0;
00068         for (r_cnt = 0; r_cnt < r->size(); r_cnt++) {
00069                 (*r)(r_cnt) = (*b)(r_cnt) - (*r)(r_cnt);
00070                 error = MAX(error, fabs((*r)(r_cnt)) );
00071         }
00072         error = error/bnrm2;
00074 
00075         if ( error < tol ) {
00076                 delete r;
00077                 return x;
00078         }
00079         
00080         vec * p = new vec(b->size());
00081         for (r_cnt = 0; r_cnt < r->size(); r_cnt++) {
00082                 (*p)(r_cnt) = (*r)(r_cnt);
00083         }
00084 
00085         vec * q = new vec(b->size());
00086         
00087         REAL rho_1, rho, beta;
00088         rho = REAL(0);
00089 
00090         error_norm = norm2(x, undef_value);
00091         
00092         for (iter = 1; iter <= max_it; iter++) {    // begin iteration
00093                 
00094                 rho_1 = rho;
00095                 rho = times(r,r); 
00096                 
00097                 if ( iter > 1 ) {                        // direction vector
00098                         beta = rho / rho_1;
00099                         // p = beta*p;
00100                         vec::iterator p_it;
00101                         vec::const_iterator r_it;
00102                         for (p_it = p->begin(), r_it = r->begin(); p_it != p->end(); ++p_it, ++r_it) 
00103                                 *p_it = *r_it + *p_it * beta;
00105                 }
00106 
00107                 A->mult(p,q);
00108         
00109                 REAL times_pq = times(p,q);
00110                 REAL alpha = 0;
00111                 if (fabs(times_pq) > MIN(1e-4,tol))
00112                         alpha = rho / times_pq;
00113 
00114                 if (alpha == 0) {
00115                         bool stop = true;
00116                 }
00117 
00118 
00119                 error = 0;
00120                                 
00121                 // x = x + alpha * p;                    // update approximation vector
00122                 vec::iterator x_it;
00123                 vec::const_iterator p_it;
00124                 for (x_it = x->begin(), p_it = p->begin(); x_it != x->end(); ++x_it, ++p_it) {
00125                         if (*x_it == undef_value)
00126                                 continue;
00127                         *x_it = *x_it + alpha * *p_it;
00128                         error = MAX(error, fabs(alpha * *p_it));
00129                 }
00131 
00132                 // REAL Error = norm2( r ) / bnrm2;      // check convergence
00133                 error = error/error_norm;
00134                 if (error_norm == 0)
00135                         error = 0;
00136                 
00137                 if ( error <= tol )
00138                         break;
00139                 
00140                 // r = r - alpha * q;                    // compute residual
00141                 vec::iterator r_it;
00142                 vec::const_iterator q_it;
00143                 for (r_it = r->begin(), q_it = q->begin(); r_it != r->end(); ++r_it, ++q_it) {
00144                         *r_it = *r_it - alpha * *q_it;
00145                 }
00147                 
00148         }
00149         
00150         if ( error > tol ) 
00151                 flag = 1;                                // no convergence
00152                 
00153         delete p;
00154         delete q;
00155         delete r;
00156 
00157         writelog(SURFIT_MESSAGE,"cg: (%d)\terror : %12.6G iter : %d",x->size(), error, iter);
00158 
00159         return x;
00160         
00161 };
00162 
00163 }; // namespace surfit;
00164 
00165 #endif 
00166


surfit-1.0.0pre
